imdb.plot outline: No money. No fame. Plenty of parties and broken bones. Life for the all-female "Too Hard" crew harks back to an era of snowboarding before the sport came with big contracts and Olympic medals. In Part 1 of this series, VICE Sports meets the gang and sees what they go through to make their film. Along with wrangling up enough money to spend winter on the road, the physical risks are real and unavoidable.
imdb.title: Lady Shredders
plot: An exclusive three-part web-series for Vice Sports. The series follows an all-female snowboard film crew, and tells their story about what it takes for women to make a career in a male dominated sport.::Lukas Huffman

No money. No fame. Plenty of parties and broken bones. Life for the all-female "Too Hard" crew harks back to an era of snowboarding before the sport came with big contracts and Olympic medals. In Part 1 of this series, VICE Sports meets the gang and sees what they go through to make their film. Along with wrangling up enough money to spend winter on the road, the physical risks are real and unavoidable.::Lukas Huffman
